page.title: 11Home Life
page.content: {Home Life There is no consistent pattern of homelife although many mothers do not go out to work other mothers do. The number of labour saving items in the home is generally high, virtually all homes will include refridgerators and or freezers in addition to automatic washing machines, vacuum cleaners etc. There are a growing number of micro-wave ovens being introduced into the kitchens but many fewer auto-matic dishwashers. Many homes are centrally heated but in addition they have a gas, electric or solid fuel fire. Most meals are taken in the home, but eating out is an increasing trend, particularly at weekends and for special occasions. Pets are very populer in homes, Dogs and Cats the most popular.
